name: Rock Pool Research
description:
A one page journaling game about rock pooling.

Close by Repository Cove and the never ending flow of messages there is a wide array of beautiful, fascinating rock pool ecosystems. Volunteers at the cove often spend their breaks there, taking some time to simply sit and enjoy the air or to examine the creatures within.

There are new creatures to be found each day. Some might be familiar: recognisable from books, documentaries and the like, and some might be out of this world.
